name: ACC Solitaire [ Yukon ] HD Free - Classic Card Games for iPad & iPhone
name_original: ACC Solitaire [ Yukon ] HD Free - Classic Card Games for iPad & iPhone
description:
!!! Fantastic Yukon Solitaire, better than ever !!!

This is simple solitaire game, which is easy to learn, but still challenging, try it for yourself. !!! After few days play, I like this solitaire a lot !!!

[ features ]

• easy gameplay
• scoring system
• game center
• simple rules
• quite solvable solitaire, but still challenging
• unlimited undo
• game statistic

[ more games ]

We have also made other awesome games, so type ”codecube brothers” to iTunes search field and you can find our other games, which are already available in the appstore! Happy gaming! :)

[ feedback ]

We can't answer messages that are written on reviews, so please send your feedback, wishes and bug reports to us support [at] ccbrothers [dot] com.
